containsCards.description:
Array of card names that should be included in the hand
Duplicates will be required multiple times
Cards specified here will not be considered for containsTags checking

excludesCards.description: Array of card names that must be missing in the hand

containsTags.description:
Array of tags that must be included in the hand
Duplicates will be required multiple times
Does not consider cards specified in containsCards

excludesTags.description: Array of tags that must not be included on any cards in the hand

maxKeepSize.description:
Hands that satisfy this set of rules are only kept if they're smaller than or equal to this number
If a hand satisfied multiple, the largest is chosen
